item.title: Bandit 0 -> 1
item.description:
Login :

  • ssh : ssh bandit0@bandit.labs.overthewire.org -p 2220
  • password : bandit0

Task :

  • in this level the goal is to try to log in using SSH with the provided credentials

Theory :

  • SSH (secure shell protocol) , is a network protocol used to remotely connect to another machine .

  • In Linux, you can remotly connect to another machine using the command ssh with :

    • ssh <username>@<server> -p <port>
      • the parts with <..> needs to be replaced with the correct informations
    • the <server> needs to be replaced with the valid URL or the IP address
    • the -p is used to be able to set the correct port

Solution :

the informations provided will lead you to the following command :
